description:
Kazuma almost faces the end! Will his poor choice of butter disqualify him from the contest already? And, Tsukino comes face to face with her younger sister, Mizuno, who proposes a bet. If Mizuno wins, then Kazuma will have to transfer to her store!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kazuma Failed!? Ultra C to the Rescue!
Kazuma Shikkaku!? Kishikaisei no Ultra C!
Kazuma a-t-il échoué !? La résurrection d’Ultra-C !
คาสึมะจะตกรอบ!? กับการฟื้นคืนชีพด้วยCพิเศษ!
和馬失格!? 起死回生のウトラC!
